text: Alor Setar Tower, also known as Kedah Tower, is a 4-story, 165.5-meter-tall telecommunication tower in Alor Setar, Kedah, Malaysia. It was once the third tallest tower in Malaysia and is the tallest structure in the state and city. It opened on 14 August 1997 by Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad. ==References== Category:1997 establishments in Asia Category:1990s establishments in Malaysia Category:Towers in Asia Category:Buildings and structures in Malaysia Category:Kedah Category:Mahathir Mohamad
title: Alor Setar Tower
